characters.story: "Jung!" Flowers undertook cooking cheerfully - time to steam with vapor!
Like a tooth, this character means tooth and asks "Yah? Ivory?"!
Like a tooth, this character means to pass through and sings "Chwahn!"!
Picture a mouth beside a tooth: that's wow!, calling out "yah"!
"Shir!" Rice and metal commanded sharply to explain - elucidating and interpreting the explanation!
The field stands for a try, singing "Fahn!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for to turn over that sings "Fahn!" cheerfully!
See how the hand forms to broadcast? It sings "Bwo!" cheerfully!
A striking symbol for fur that asks "Mao? Fluffy?" curiously!
The body stands for tail, whispering "Way" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Like a roof, this character means a dwelling and asks "Jigh? Residence?"!
"Twoh!" Words about dwelling sang cheerfully - ready to entrust, rely and consign!
"Way!" Claws and elephant commanded sharply to act - do, handle and govern!
Like a person, this character means bogus and whispers "Way"!
The strokes unite to show long, asking "Chahng? Forever?" curiously!
"Jahng!" The long bow sang cheerfully to stretch - extending, expanding and lengthening!
"Jahng!" Water stretched sharply - time to swell, inflate and rise in price!
An striking symbol for a cover that shouts "Tao!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show hair of the head, whispering "Fah" softly!
Like a body, this character means to unfold and whispers "Jahn"!
